powergrid.tasks

Class RestTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • powergrid.tasks.Task
      • powergrid.tasks.StepTask
        • powergrid.tasks.RestTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Task>, Configurable

    public class RestTask
extends StepTask
implements Configurable
    Creates a Task that rests the local Player.

    A boolean can be set to abort resting when there are other Tasks in the Queue.

    This Task is Configurable and publicly accessible to end-users.

      Creates a new RestTask with the given priority.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RestTask

        public RestTask()

      • RestTask

        public RestTask(int priority,
        boolean abortOnTask)
        Creates a new RestTask with the given priority.

        abortOnTask indicates whether this Task should be aborted when another Task is added to the TaskQueue.

        Parameters:
        priority - the priority of this Task
        abortOnTask - when true, aborts this Task when other Tasks are pending

      • RestTask

        public RestTask(int priority,
        boolean abortOnTask,
        int requiredEnergy)
        Creates a new RestTask with the given priority.

        abortOnTask indicates whether this Task should be aborted when another Task is added to the TaskQueue.

        requiredEnergy indicates the energy the local Player must have before this Task ends. When abortOnTask is set, this amount of energy may not have been achieved when this Task ends.

        Parameters:
        priority - the priority of this Task
        abortOnTask - when true, aborts this Task when other Tasks are pending
        requiredEnergy - the amount of energy the Player must have before this Task ends.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Attempts to issue the rest command to the RSBot environment.

        This Task will be canceled here when the required energy is already achieved.

        Overrides:
        start in class StepTask

      • step

        public void step()
        Checks if the Player is resting. If not, it restarts this Task. If the Player is resting and the targetEnergy has been achieved, this Task ends.
        Specified by:
        step in class StepTask

        Returns:
        a configuration panel.

      • apply

        public void apply()
        Description copied from interface: Configurable
        Called by PowerGrid to indicate that the Task should parse the configuration panel's data and save the configuration settings.

        After this method returns, the Task will be automatically assigned to the TaskManager.

        Specified by:
        apply in interface Configurable

      • configCanceled

        public void configCanceled()
        Description copied from interface: Configurable
        Called by PowerGrid to indicate the configuration panel is closed without running the Task.
        Specified by:
        configCanceled in interface Configurable
